Top 10 Smoothies

  • Apple & Banana smoothie

  • Coffee & Banana smoothie

  • Mango & Banana smoothie

  • Vanilla almond smoothie

  • Orange & Carrot smoothie

  • Cacao yogurt smoothie

  • Melon & Mint smoothie

  • Watermelon frozen smoothie

  • Banana & Raspberry smoothie

  • Strawberry frozen smoothie

Developed by  OlgaKulik

Apple & kale smoothie

Ingredients

  • 1 banana
  • 1-2 cups kale
  • 1 cup apple cider (no sugar added)
  • 1 cup water or ice
  • Optional: Flaxseed, pecans, nut butter

Instructions

Once you have all your ingredients in the blender, you know what to do – blend on high until smooth!

Next

Coffee & Banana smoothie

Ingredients

  • 1 cup strong brewed coffee
  • 1 banana
  • 1/4-cup rolled oats
  • 1 tablespoon cocoa powder
  • 1 cup soy milk or almond milk
  • cream topping

Instructions

Pour coffee into an ice cube tray and freeze overnight.

Combine all the ingredients in a blender, including the coffee ice cubes and blend until smooth.

Next

Mango & Banana smoothie

Ingredients

  • 1 medium mango
  • 1 banana
  • 250ml orange juice
  • 4 ice cubes

Instructions

Cut the mango down either side of the flat stone, then peel and cut the flesh into chunks. Peel and chop the banana.

Put all the ingredients into a food processor or blender, then process until smooth and thick. Keep in the fridge and use the day you make it.

Next

Vanilla almond smoothie

Ingredients

  • 2 cups soy, rice or almond milk, or silken tofu, or yogurt
  • 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract
  • 1/2 frozen banana, optional
  • cream topping

Instructions

Combine everything in a blender. Pulse the machine, then turn it on and purée until smooth. If you’re not getting enough action, add juice or water a little at a time until the machine gets a grip. Serve immediately.

Next

Orange & Carrot smoothie

Ingredients

  • 2 oranges, peeled
  • 2 large, organic carrots, chopped
  • 1/2 to 1 inch ginger to taste
  • 1-2 splashes of water
  • Ice to chill if desired

Instructions

Squeeze one of the oranges into your blender to provide enough juice to help it blend. Then add the rest of the orange pulp and the second orange, both carrots and the ginger to your blender. Blend on high until smooth

Next

Cacao yogurt smoothie

Ingredients

  • 3/4 cup chocolate low-fat frozen yogurt
  • 2 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa
  • 1/2 cup unsweetened almond milk
  • Dark chocolate shavings for garnish

Instructions

Purée frozen yogurt, cocoa, and milk in a blender until smooth. Pour into a chilled glass, and garnish with chocolate shavings. Serve right away!

Next

Melon & Mint smoothie

Ingredients

  • 2 cups honeydew melon, cubed
  • 6 fresh mint leaves
  • 3 cups chopped baby bok choy leaves
  • 100ml unsweetened almond milk

Instructions

Place all of the ingredients in a blender and pulse until smooth, about 30 seconds. Serve right away!

Next

Watermelon frozen smoothie

Ingredients

  • 1 cup frozen cubed watermelon
  • 1/2 cup water
  • 1 tablespoon of honey or other sweetener to taste
  • a few mint and/or basil leaves

Instructions

Blend the watermelon and the water until smooth. Add the honey and mint and blend another 10-20 seconds until mostly smooth and the consistency of a slushy. Serve immediately!

Next

Banana & Raspberry smoothie

Ingredients

  • 3 very ripe bananas, cut into chunks, frozen
  • 1/2 cup frozen raspberries
  • 1 cup almond milk
  • 1/2 cup fresh orange juice (preferably no sugar added)
  • 2 tablespoons raw honey (more to taste, if desired)

Instructions

Place all of the ingredients in a blender and pulse until smooth, about 30 seconds. Serve right away!

Next

Strawberry frozen smoothie

Ingredients

  • 1 cup frozen strawberries
  • 1 cup milk
  • 1 banana
  • 1⁄4 cup sugar

Instructions

Put all ingredients in blender. Blend until smooth. Serve immediately!

Next
